member.name: F:HiQPdfPrv.Pdf.Security.SecurityHandlers.Standard
member.summary: The built-in password-based security handler.

member.name: T:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfCompressionLevel
member.summary: This enumration represents the possible compression levels that can be used in the PDF documents created by the RTF to PDF library

member.name: F:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfCompressionLevel.AboveNormal
member.summary: Better compression but takes more time to compress

member.name: F:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfCompressionLevel.BelowNormal
member.summary: Something middle between normal and BestSpeed compressions

member.name: F:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfCompressionLevel.Best
member.summary: Use the best compression but takes more time to compress

member.name: F:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfCompressionLevel.BestSpeed
member.summary: The compression speed is high but the compression percentage is low

member.name: F:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfCompressionLevel.NoCompression
member.summary: Does not do any compression

member.name: F:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfCompressionLevel.Normal
member.summary: Use normal compression, a balance between compression speed and resulted size

member.name: T:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter
member.summary: This class offers the necessary API to create a PDF document from a specified RTF string or file

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a RTF to PDF converter which will autodetect the width and height of the RTF document

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a RTF to PDF converter which will autodetect the height of the RTF document.

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a RTF to PDF converter for a RTF document with the specified width and height

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.GetPdfBytesFromRtfString(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the PDF document rendered from the specified RTF file to a memory buffer.
member.returns: An array of bytes containing the binary representation of the generatedPDF document

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.SavePdfFromRtfStringToStream(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the rendered PDF document from the specified rtf string to the specified stream.
member.param: The output stream where to save the generated PDF document.

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.GetPdfBytesFromRtfFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the PDF document rendered from the specified RTF file to a memory buffer.
member.param: The full path of the RTF file
member.returns: An array of bytes containing the binary representation of the PDF document

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.SavePdfFromRtfFileToStream(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document rendered from the specified RTF file to the specified stream.
member.param: The full path of the RTF file
The output stream where to save the generated PDF document.

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.SavePdfFromRtfStringToFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the rendered PDF document from the specified URL into the specified disk file
member.param: The full path of the file where to save the rendered PDF document

member.name: M:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.SavePdfFromRtfFileToFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the rendered PDF document from the specified HTML file into the specified disk file
member.param: The full path of the file where to save the rendered PDF document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.LicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the RTF to PDF converter license key

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.PageWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the RTF document width

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.PageHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the RTF document height. If the width was not set aswell, this property has no effect

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.PdfDocumentOptions
member.summary: Gets a reference to an object to control the generated PDF document options

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.PdfHeaderOptions
member.summary: Gets a reference to an object to control the generated PDF document header options

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.PdfFooterOptions
member.summary: Gets a reference to an object to control the generated PDF document footer options

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.AvoidTextBreak
member.summary: When true this property instructs the converter to try to avoid cutting off the text at PDF page boundry

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.RightToLeftEnabled
member.summary: This property is obsolete. Setting this property is not necessary anymore when converting pages in right-to-left languages like Hebrew or Arabic.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.AdjustBorderSize
member.summary: A small value to subtract from the width and hight of the colored background to make the thin lines of 1 pixel around this background more visible when zooming out in the Adobe Reader PDF Viewer. The default value is 0.5 pixels.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.AdjustThinLinesWidth
member.summary: A small increment value for the 1 pixel thin lines width to make them more visible when zooming out in the Adobe Reader PDF Viewer. The default value is 0 pixels.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.BkgTransparency
member.summary: Modify background transparency. 0 means transparent, 100 means opaque.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.ImgTransparency
member.summary: Modify images transparency. 0 means transparent, 100 means opaque.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.AlphaBlendEnabled
member.summary: Enables or disables alpha blending for transparent images. Default is true.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.TransparencyEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if the transparency is enabled in the generated PDF document. Default value is true. This property can be set to false to eliminate the additional flattening time when the document is sent to the printer from Adobe Reader viewer.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.MaskBltEnabled
member.summary: Enables or disables masking for transparent images. Default is true.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.UseCrossRefStreams
member.summary: When this property is true, the generated PDF will store the PDF cross-reference table and PDF trailer in compressed cross-reference streams and therefore the generated PDF document will be smaller in size. Set this false for compatibility with third party tools unable to understand the cross-reference streams. The default value is false.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.TruncateOutOfBoundsText
member.summary: Internal use only.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.OptimizePdfPageBreaks
member.summary: A flag indicating if the converter uses an optimized page breaks algorithm to improve document scrolling inside a PDF Viewer. The optimized algorithm can introduce a small additional processing time when the PDF document is generated. The default value is true and the optimized page breaks algorithm is used by default.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfConverter.OptimizeMemoryUsage
member.summary: When this property is true the library will try to release the unused memory as soon as possible. The default value is true.

member.name: T:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates the options to control the PDF document redering process. The PDFConverter class define a reference to an object of this type

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.LeftMargin
member.summary: The rendered PDF document left margin

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.RightMargin
member.summary: The rendered PDF document right margin

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.TopMargin
member.summary: The rendered PDF document top margin

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.BottomMargin
member.summary: The rendered PDF document bottom margin

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.PdfCompressionLevel
member.summary: This property controls the compression level of the rendered PDF document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.PdfPageSize
member.summary: This property controls the size of the rendered PDF document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.PdfPageOrientation
member.summary: This property controls the page orientation of the rendered PDF document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.FitWidth
member.summary: When this property is true the HTML content will be resized if necessary to fit the available width in PDF page. When false the HTML content will be rendered at the real size. By default this property is true and the content will be resized if necessary to fit the available width in PDF page

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.FitHeight
member.summary: When this property is true the RTF content will be resized if necessary to fit the available height in PDF page. By default this property is false.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.EmbedFonts
member.summary: When true this options instructs the converter to embed all the true type fonts into the PDF document. The default value is false.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.ShowHeader
member.summary: This property controls the whether the header appears or not in the rendered PDF document. The header properties can be further customized by setting the properties of the PDFHeaderOptions object exposed by the PDFHeaderOptions property of the PDFConverter class.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.ShowFooter
member.summary: This property controls the whether the footer appears or not in the rendered PDF document. The footer properties can be further customized by setting the properties of the PDFFooterOptions object exposed by the PDFFooterOptions property of the PDFConverter class.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.AppendPDFFile
member.summary: The full path of an existing PDF document to be appended to the PDF document resulted after conversion

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.AppendPDFFileArray
member.summary: An array of full paths of existing PDF documents to be appended to the PDF document resulted after conversion

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.AppendPDFStream
member.summary: The PDF stream to be appended to the PDF document resulted after conversion

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfDocumentOptions.AppendPDFStreamArray
member.summary: An array of PDF streams to be appended to the PDF document resulted after conversion

member.name: T:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfFooterOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates the options to control the appearance of the footer in the rendered PDF document. The PDFConverter class contains a reference to an object of this type. If the ShowFooter property from PDFDocumentOptions object is false, the footer options have no effect

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfFooterOptions.FooterText
member.summary: The text to appear in the rendered PDF document footer

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfFooterOptions.FooterTextColor
member.summary: The color of the text displayed in the footer

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfFooterOptions.ShowPageNumber
member.summary: When true, the page numbers. The default value is true.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfFooterOptions.DrawFooterLine
member.summary: When true, a line is displayed above the footer area. The default value is true.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfFooterOptions.PageNumberText
member.summary: The text to be displayed before the page number. The default value is 'Page'

member.name: T:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfHeaderOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates the options to control the appearance of the header in the rendered PDF document. The PDFConverter class contains a reference to an object of this type. If the ShowHeader property of the PDFDocumentOptions object is false, the header options have no effect

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfHeaderOptions.HeaderText
member.summary: The text to appear in the rendered PDF document title.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfHeaderOptions.HeaderTextColor
member.summary: The color of the text displayed in the header

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfHeaderOptions.HeaderSubtitleText
member.summary: A smaller text to appear in the rendered PDF document header under the title.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PdfHeaderOptions.DrawHeaderLine
member.summary: When true, a line is displayed under the header area. The default value is true.

member.name: T:EvoPdf.RtfToPdf.PDFPageOrientation
member.summary: PDF page orientation

member.summary: Portrait
